Blogroll

Here's a loosely categorised, irregularly updated collection of the feeds I follow. Because the internet was created to be a library, not a shopping centre. Descriptions are from the feeds themselves, so sorry if they're not very descriptive.

  • Improv Fables

    The newsletter of Chris Mead. Improviser, writer and dog-owner. Subscribe to get the following in your inbox every Wednesday. * THREE recommendations of things I've enjoyed this week * ONE new class or show I'm offering * ONE new essay about improv * ONE picture of my dog, Radio (by far our most popular feature)
